main.name: Divyang Arora
main.description: I am a computer engineering senior at the University of Ottawa. I am interested in artificial intelligence, algorithm design, and software development.
main.bio1: I like building awesome software. I've built websites, browser plugins, corporate software and even games! If you are interested, you can view some of my favorite projects in my portfolio down below.
main.bio2: Need something built or simply want to have chat? Reach out to me on social media or send me an email.
main.interests: When I am not coding my next project, I enjoy spending my time doing any of the following:
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Applied Science in Computer Engineering
education.description: Minor in Engineering Management and Entrepreneurship (CO-OP)

work.title: Data Science Intern
work.description1: Developed a predictive model with 92% accuracy to forecast whether a customer will refinance.
work.description2: Automated creation of personalized marketing campaigns (300,000 customers) based on model results.
work.description3: Campaign is projected to generate 300 new mortgages annually, according to preliminary results.
work.description4: Technologies Used: Python, Apache Spark, SQL, Docker, Hadoop, Hive

work.title: Data Science Intern
work.description1: Prototyped and built a classifier for JIRA tickets, removing low priority tickets to save hundreds of human processing hours.
work.description2: Applied a keyword search algorithm to quantify and report how funds are spread internally across different research areas.
work.description3: Generated reports and data visualizations in Tableau for Business Insights Team.
work.description4: Technologies Used: Python, Apache Spark, JIRA, SQL, R, Tableau

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description1: Developed a graph analysis software using PANDAS to analyze 10,000+ graphs.
work.description2: Implemented RESTful APIs in Node.js and Express.js to retrieve and store data-sets with MongoDB.
work.description3: Designed an internal client facing UI with React.js and Angular to allow for data visualization and analysis with D3.js.
work.description4: Technologies Used: Python, PANDAS, MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, React.js, Angular, D3.js

research.title: Engineering Research Assistant
research.description1: Worked on implementing ML models interacting with nanotech wearable electronics to predict user activity.
research.description2: Researched Flexible Hybrid Electronics (FHE) that integrate both thin silicon chips along with printable electronic materials and sensors.

projects.title: Used various ML models to predict Graham Numbers of stocks and identify value investing opportunities. Trying to encompass teachings of The Intelligent Investor by Benjamin Graham.
Utilized word2vec and TensorFlow to help identify undervalued domains for sale. Converted a $1,000 investment to a portfolio worth over $12,000.
Created a SQL Query Parser checking for redundant JOINs and simplifying logic.

projects.company: Python and Statistics for Financial Analysis
projects.title: Completed course from The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology.
